mapper.insert: insert into application (id, patient_id, doctor_id, status, createtime) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{patientId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{doctorId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select id, patient_id, doctor_id, status, createtime from application

SELECT a.id as aid,a.doctor_id as doctorId,a.patient_id as pId,a.`status` as status,a.createtime as createtime, u.real_name as userName,ep.start_time as startTime,ep.end_time as endTime,ep.id as epId,u.id as uId FROM `application` a LEFT JOIN patient p ON p.id=a.patient_id LEFT JOIN user u ON u.id=p.user_id LEFT JOIN exercise_process ep ON ep.patient_id=p.id
WHERE a.doctor_id= #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND u.real_name LIKE concat('%',#{filter,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') AND a.status != 3
GROUP BY p.id
